product_description.product_use: Construction material for foundations, driveways, footpaths, high-rise buildings, dams, spillways, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure, etc.

product_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
product_classes.special_class: High-strength/high-performance concrete, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)
databases_and_software.note_on_impact_categories: Some impact categories modelled separately based on generic processes

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation when physical not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging

data_quality.assessment: Good or very good geographic and temporal representativeness
data_quality.background_data_timeliness: All updated within 10 years as required under PCR 2019:14

processes_included.upstream: Raw material extraction, transport, manufacturing, electricity generation
processes_included.core: External and internal transport, concrete manufacturing (excluding mixing in truck), waste and wastewater treatment
processes_included.downstream: Distribution, installation, construction waste, transport and treatment of waste at end of life

installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation site work and forms

deconstruction.method: Physical process of drilling and removing concrete using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Replaces virgin coarse aggregate for various applications depending on product performance

carbon_emission_context.carbonation_note: CO2 absorption by concrete over lifetime (carbonation) not included in EPD results; recommended to consider in whole-of-life studies per BS EN 16757:2017

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes

additional_info.sustainability_strategy: Industry's first 2050 net-zero targets endorsed by Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi)
